replies.author: jued_huangjim
replies.txt_content:
left_click_requirement:
      requirements:
        economy:
          type: has money
          amount: 10
      deny_commands:
      - '[message] §f［§c资源商店§f］§r §f您的银币余额不足。§r'
      - '[player] balance<delay=10>'
      - '[close]'
